Content Sync

What is the Content Sync Config Node

The node structure that determines what should be included in the built application zip file

  • AEM Apps builds this node as part of the application create process
  • This node needs to be replicated to publish
  • The root node has a nodetype of cq:ContentSyncConfig and a sling:resourceType property set to contentsync/config
  • Each node below the root has two propertys
  • path - which is the location of the content to be copied/requested
  • type - this is used to determine what type of content handler to use when requesting content
